Hero.title: THE BEST AND SAFEST ANESTHETICS FOR TATTOOS AND PMU
Hero.headline: FEEL THE POWER OF NO PAIN
Hero.subtitle: LIDOCAINE NUMBING CREAM DESIGNED FOR TATTOOS, WAXING, LASER TREATMENTS AND MORE.

About.intro: At No Pain we develop advanced topical anesthesia formulas specially designed for the tattoo process. Our creams contain a high concentration of anesthetic agents that block nerve stimuli and partially or completely reduce skin sensitivity.
About.result1: Less pain and discomfort during tattoo and permanent makeup sessions.
About.result2: No interference with the skin's natural healing process.
About.result3: Absolute respect for pigment tone and fixation.
About.closing: Thanks to state-of-the-art technology, we offer a more comfortable, safe, and professional tattoo experience without compromising artistic quality or the final result on your skin.

products.title: OUR PRODUCTS
products.noPainNumbingCreamTagline: Topical anesthetic cream for tattoos and PMU. Designed to reduce pain without affecting healing or pigment retention.
products.noPainNumbingCreamDescription: Anesthetic cream for use before tattooing. Reduces pain without interfering with healing or pigments.
products.feature1: Significantly reduces pain during the session.
products.feature2: Does not interfere with the skin's natural healing.
products.feature3: Respects pigment retention and color tone.
products.feature4: Safe and effective for tattoos and PMU.
products.noPainNumbingCreamUsage1: Apply a thick layer 20 minutes before the procedure.
products.noPainNumbingCreamUsage2: Cover with plastic film for greater effectiveness.
products.noPainNumbingCreamUsage3: Remove the excess before starting the tattoo session.
products.noPainNumbingCreamUsage4: Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes.
products.noPainNumbingCreamTip1: Store in a cool, dry place.
products.noPainNumbingCreamTip3: Test on a small area before full application.
products.xteriNumbTagline: Disinfectant and anesthetic spray for use during tattooing.
products.xteriNumbDescription: Xteri-Numb is a spray designed for application during a tattoo session. It helps keep the area clean, disinfected, and with reduced pain sensitivity.
products.xteriBenefit4: Does not affect pigments or healing
products.xteriUsage2: Spray onto the tattooed skin as needed.
products.xteriUsage3: Do not rinse, let it act immediately.
products.xteriUsage4: Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes.
products.xteriTip1: Keep in a cool, dry place.
products.xteriTip3: Do not apply to open wounds.
products.wicannTagline: Soothing and regenerative tonic for post-tattoo care.
products.wicannDescription: Wicann is a tonic formulated with natural extracts that help reduce irritation and promote skin regeneration after a tattoo. Ideal for quick and safe recovery.
products.wicannBenefit1: Hydrates and soothes freshly tattooed skin
products.wicannUsage1: Clean the tattooed area with Green Soap.
products.wicannUsage2: Apply Wicann directly to the skin.
products.wicannUsage4: Repeat 2-3 times a day as needed.
products.wicannTip2: Keep in a cool, dry place.
products.wicannTip3: Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes.
products.greenSoapDescription: Our Green Soap with 4% chlorhexidine gluconate is formulated to provide deep and safe cleaning. Ideal for skin disinfection, wound hygiene, and cleaning contaminated areas.
products.greenSoapBenefit3: Safe and effective for skin care
products.greenSoapAdditional: A reliable solution for preparation, disinfection, and care in procedures requiring maximum hygiene.
products.greenSoapUsage1: Dilute 1 part soap with 9 parts filtered or distilled water.
products.greenSoapUsage2: Apply with a spray bottle or clean cloth to the skin.
products.greenSoapUsage3: Use during and after tattooing for cleaning.
products.greenSoapUsage4: Store in a clean, sealed container.
products.greenSoapTip1: Always use diluted to avoid irritation.
products.greenSoapTip3: Keep out of reach of children.
products.greenSoapTip4: Ideal for cleaning equipment and surfaces as well.

Gallery.title: GALLERY
Gallery.description: Discover studios, tattoo artists, and experiences with No Pain Brand.
Gallery.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video.

photo1.longDesc: Our premium cream applied before tattooing: the strongest and safest formula on the market, designed to provide comfort and confidence in every session.

photo2.longDesc: The Xteri-Numb spray prepares the skin for long sessions. A practical application that ensures continuous comfort and flawless results.

photo3.longDesc: The soothing power of Witch Hazel in every drop: Wicann refreshes and protects the skin, allowing the ink to settle evenly.

photo4.longDesc: Effective and safe cleaning with No Pain’s Green Soap: disinfection without irritation to ensure a flawless tattoo from start to finish.

photo5.longDesc: No Pain in its professional format: maximum power in every application, designed to support the artist in any tattoo style.

photo6.longDesc: Formulated with 4% lidocaine, Xteri-Numb provides reliable anesthetic and disinfecting action without altering pigments or healing.

photo7.longDesc: An exhibition that represents our philosophy: premium products created for artists who demand the best in every detail.

photo8.longDesc: The foundation of professional hygiene: Green Soap keeps the skin clean, calm, and ready, supporting tattoo artists worldwide.

video1.longDesc: Are you suffering because you want to? Here is the solution: No Pain. It's not for everyone, but it offers relief and control when needed.

video2.longDesc: Since I discovered No Pain, I always test it on myself first. It allows color tattoos without affecting healing or pigments. I've done many color works and they always healed properly.

video3.longDesc: Adrián from Adsertattoos (Florida), realism specialist with ~13 years of career. Uses 2–3 applications on large pieces, moves the cream as you progress, and reapplies to keep the client comfortable during long sessions.

video4.longDesc: Andrés (SupplyTattoo) highlights 3 benefits: it allows people afraid of pain to get tattoos, helps resume paused projects, and makes it easier for clients with low tolerance. Apply 1–2 mm, cover for 90–120 min (first time), effect ~2–6 h; safe on fresh skin and does not affect pigments.

video5.longDesc: No Pain works with all tattoo styles, providing comfort while preserving pigment and healing.

video6.longDesc: Tattoo transformation like never before: No Pain allows more comfortable sessions, with long-lasting anesthesia and focus on artistic results. Hours of comfort to achieve the best work.

video7.longDesc: Looking for effective cleaning during tattooing? No Pain's Green Soap with chlorhexidine is ideal for disinfecting the skin. Dilute, apply, and tattoo with confidence. Professional results.

video8.longDesc: Wicann Witch Hazel is ideal for diluting pigments and creating different tones that adapt to your style. Its balm & astringent action allows ink to settle more evenly on the skin. Apply it directly to the skin for a trauma-free and irritation-free tattoo. Also ideal for skincare routines, aesthetic processes, and permanent makeup.

Contact.submitMessage: Thank you for contacting us. We will respond soon.

Monumby.title: Mother of Numby
Monumby.subtitle: The premium line of No Pain: advanced formulas, greater potency, and professional support.
Monumby.ctaText: Discover the difference of working with Monumby, the premium product line created for artists who demand the best.

noPain.title: No Pain — FAQ
noPain.a1: No Pain is a topical anesthetic cream designed for tattoos and PMU.
noPain.a2: Effects can last several hours depending on use.
noPain.a3: Yes, when used as directed by professionals.

xteri.title: Xteri-Numb — FAQ
xteri.a1: A disinfectant and anesthetic spray for use during tattooing.
xteri.a2: Shake well and spray on tattooed skin as needed.
xteri.a3: Yes, when applied by professionals during tattooing.
xteri.a4: No, it does not affect pigments or healing.
xteri.a5: Avoid eyes, mucous membranes and open wounds.

wicann.title: Wicann — FAQ
wicann.a1: A soothing and regenerative tonic for post-tattoo care.
wicann.a2: Clean with Green Soap and apply Wicann 2–3 times a day.
wicann.a3: Yes, it contains natural extracts to reduce irritation and aid recovery.
wicann.a4: It complements post-tattoo creams, helping the skin recover faster.
wicann.a5: Avoid eyes and mucous membranes. For external use only.

greenSoap.title: Green Soap — FAQ
greenSoap.a1: Dilute 1:9 and use for skin cleaning during tattooing.
greenSoap.a2: It contains 4% chlorhexidine gluconate for safe antiseptic action.
greenSoap.q3: Is it safe for all skin types?
greenSoap.a3: Yes, when diluted correctly it is safe for most skin types.
greenSoap.a4: Ideal for cleaning wounds, equipment, and contaminated areas.
greenSoap.a5: Always dilute before use. Keep away from children.

Legal.title: POLICIES & LEGAL
Legal.intellectualPropertyText: All trademarks, logos and content belong to No Pain Brand and are protected by law.
Legal.registrationText: Our products must be used only by professionals and according to local regulations.
Legal.internationalText: No Pain has authorized distributors worldwide. Unauthorized resellers are not covered.
Legal.infractionsText: Any violation of intellectual property or misuse of products may result in legal action.
Legal.termsText: By using our website or products, you agree to comply with all terms and conditions.
Legal.privacyText: We respect your privacy. Personal data is handled under strict confidentiality.
